alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 1:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bladen and east central Robeson Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 124 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Howellsville, or 8 miles northeast of Lumberton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tobermory, Smiths, Ruskin, Howellsville, Tolarsville, Duart, Barker Ten Mile, Ammon, White Oak, Jerome, Dublin and Tar Heel. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 23 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
